info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 7:27PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Valley County through 830 PM MDT... At 725 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Tampico, or 22 miles north of Glasgow, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Glasgow, Tampico, St. Marie, Vandalia and Whatley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
